mapper.select: select attr.channel_id channel_id, c.category_id category_id, m.model_id model_id, p.product_id product_id from ( select distinct attr.channel_id, attr.category_url_key, attr.model_url_key, attr.product_url_key from voyageone_cms.cms_mt_product_attribute attr where attr.channel_id = #{channel_id} and attr.deal_flag = 0 limit 500 ) attr left join voyageone_cms.cms_bt_category c on c.url_key = attr.category_url_key left join voyageone_cms.cms_bt_model m on m.url_key = attr.model_url_key left join voyageone_cms.cms_bt_product p on p.url_key = attr.product_url_key where category_id is not null and model_id is not null and product_id is not null ;

select relation.category_id category_id, relation.parent_category_id parent, category.main_category_id main_category_id from voyageone_cms.cms_bt_relation_category relation left join voyageone_cms.cms_bt_category_extend category on category.category_id = relation.category_id where relation.channel_id = #{channel_id} ;
select prop_id as propId, prop_type as propType, parent_prop_id as parentPropId, prop_name as propName from voyageone_ims.ims_mt_prop where category_id = #{category_id} order by prop_id asc;
select channel_id, prop_name, prop_type, prop_value from voyageone_ims.ims_bt_feed_prop_mapping_default where channel_id = #{channel_id} ;

select `channel_id`, `main_category_id`, `prop_id`, `conditions`, `type`, `value` from voyageone_ims.ims_bt_feed_prop_mapping where channel_id = #{channel_id} and main_category_id = #{main_category_id} ;

select `channel_id`, `main_category_id`, `prop` as `prop_name`, `conditions`, `type`, `value` from voyageone_ims.ims_bt_sku_prop_mapping where channel_id = #{channel_id} and main_category_id = #{main_category_id} ;
select prop_name, edit, prefix, suffix, comment from voyageone_ims.ims_bt_prop_value_sku_template;

select m.model_id as model_id, ext.main_category_id as main_category_id, ext_cn.main_category_id as main_category_id_cn, ext_cn_tm.tm_category_id as tm_category_id, ext_cn_jd.jd_category_id as jd_category_id, ext.model_id as ext_model_id, ext_cn.model_id as ext_cn_model_id, ext_cn_tm.model_id as ext_cn_tm_model_id, ext_cn_jd.model_id as ext_cn_jd_model_id from voyageone_cms.cms_bt_model m left join voyageone_cms.cms_bt_model_extend ext on m.model_id = ext.model_id left join voyageone_cms.cms_bt_cn_model_extend ext_cn on m.model_id = ext_cn.model_id left join voyageone_cms.cms_bt_cn_tm_model_extend ext_cn_tm on m.model_id = ext_cn_tm.model_id left join voyageone_cms.cms_bt_cn_jd_model_extend ext_cn_jd on m.model_id = ext_cn_jd.model_id where m.channel_id = #{channel_id} and m.model_id = #{model_id};

select distinct m.category_id as category_id, m.platform_cid as platform_cid, v.platform_id as platform_id from voyageone_ims.ims_mt_category_mapping m left join Synship.viw_com_cart_shop_channel_mapping v on v.cart_id = m.platform_cart_id where m.category_id = #{categoryId} ;
